Package net.xpkgclient.vars

Class XPkgFile

java.lang.Object
net.xpkgclient.vars.XPkgVar
net.xpkgclient.vars.XPkgFile
public class XPkgFile extends XPkgVar
A variable which represents a file, which can point to a file or directory.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    XPkgFile(File file, XPkgResource parentResource)
    Create a new file variable pointing to a file.

  • Constructor Details

    • XPkgFile

      public XPkgFile(File file, XPkgResource parentResource)
      Create a new file variable pointing to a file.
      Parameters:
      file - The file that this variable points to initially.
      parentResource - The resource that this file is within.

  • Method Details

    • getVarType

      public VarType getVarType()
      Get the type of variable this is.
      Specified by:
      getVarType in class XPkgVar
      Returns:
      Always returns VarType.FILE

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Get the string representation of the data held in the variable.
      Specified by:
      toString in class XPkgVar
      Returns:
      The absolute path to the file or directory that this variable is pointing to.

    • copy

      public XPkgFile copy()
      Create a copy of this variable.
      Specified by:
      copy in class XPkgVar
      Returns:
      A new XPkgFile that points to the same file or directory as this one.

    • getValue

      public File getValue()
      Get the current value of this variable.
      Returns:
      The File object of the file that this variable points to.

    • isDirectory

      public boolean isDirectory()
      Check if the value of this variable points to a directory or a file.
      Returns:
      True if this file points to a directory and false if it points to a file.

    • exists

      public boolean exists()
      Check if the value of this variable points to an existing directory or file.
      Returns:
      True if this file points to an existing directory or variable.

    • getParentResource

      public XPkgResource getParentResource()
      Get the parent resource that this file ultimately derives from
      Returns:
      The parent resource that this file ultimately derives from.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Get the name of the file that this variable is storing.
      Returns:
      The name of the file or directory.
